A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a true Star wars fan I have to say this movie was a betrayal to true fans and  an attempt to further mainstream Star Wars. I would rather watch 2h of Rebels than this movie. In my opinion this movie has far too many loopholes\, from a non trained force sensitive person flying through space\, to the disaster of what Snoke's story was. This movie might be considered good by critics\, but for me it is a true fans worst nightmare. Feels nothing like the Star Wars I grew up with and fell in love with. RIP star wars
